column30: comment:"The kettle is well made and feels solid. Although it’s very slow and noisy when boiling. On the box it claims hot cup in few seconds
column31: but I always get a single cup (kettle filled to MIN level) in no less than 4-5 minutes at ambient temperature. Even if I have boiled water about an hour ago it still needs good few minutes to boil it again. "}
column34: comment:"the warranty card along with the product was not stamped nor any date written on it. how to claim warranty if required"}
